news.title: 2nd SpaceX: Next Starship Prototype Taking Shape
news.content: 2nd Construction of the test craft is proceeding apace, as two new photos posted on Twitter today (Sept. 17) by company founder and CEO Elon Musk reveal.

news.title: 2nd NASA: Juno Mission Cheks Out Eclipse on Jupiter
news.previewContent: 2nd All is well on our largest neighbor; NASA Juno...
news.content: 2nd All is well on our largest neighbor; NASA Juno spacecraft just managed to spot the shadow of Jupiter moon, Io, passing over its marbled clouds.

news.title: 2nd Europe Wants Ideas for Cave-Spelumking Moon Robots
news.content: 2nd As NASA makes a big push to land humans on the moon surface by 2024, the European Space Agency (ESA) wants to learn more about the lunar caves that lie beneath.
